title: Layout Config
description: Configuration schema for page content layout stored in config.page_content.layout JSONB column. Controls responsive positioning and container behavior using Tailwind CSS conventions.

colSpan.description: Responsive column span (maps to Tailwind col-span-* classes).

rowSpan.description: Number of grid rows this content spans.

gridCols.description: For containers: number of grid columns for child layout (maps to Tailwind grid-cols-* classes).

gap.description: Tailwind gap class for container spacing (e.g. 'gap-4', 'gap-x-4 gap-y-6').

containerType.description: Container layout mode. Layout types control physical arrangement; semantic types control UI behavior.

collapsible.description: If true, the container can be collapsed/expanded by the user.

ResponsiveValue.description: Mobile-first responsive values following Tailwind breakpoints (sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px, xl: 1280px, 2xl: 1536px).

default.description: Default value (mobile-first, applies to all breakpoints unless overridden).
